Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 31st overall pick, by Toronto in 2008...
Injured on 8/28/2008 with a Bruised Heel, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/9/2010, off Lance Carter (BAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/9/2010, off Ricky Nolasco (TB)...
Injured on 8/6/2010 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Cleveland on 7/29/2012...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/2012, hitting .440 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Injured on 5/11/2013 with a Pulled Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 8/13/2013...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/2014, hitting .588 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Traded from Toronto to Chicago (A) on 2/12/2015 (Going to CHA: 1B D. Cooper. Going to TOR: 2B M. Semien)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Detroit on 4/8/2016...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/5/2019 to a 4-year deal worth $2,120,532 per year...
Injured on 8/24/2019 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Released by Kansas City on 6/16/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 6/16/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $2,120,532 per year...
